about_the_game:
• 🐸 "Rana Card" is a roguelite card game 🐸

    You’ll play as a farm manager, completing KPI set by the Frog Corporation.

    Draw cards in exciting, tense moments!

    Navigate or exploit time explosions💥!

    Earn card packs and treasure chests,

    Build your deck,

    Play cards to earn money!

    Strategically choose your path,

    And face a variety of decision-making events, disaster years, and cataclysms along the way.

    =============================================================================

  • 🌾 Exciting Card Draws 🌾


    You’ll have a magical bag filled with unique cards, each with its time value.

    Each round, you’ll need to draw as many cards as possible within the time limit.

    😮 Want to draw one more?

    😏 How about one more?

    😫 Maybe another one?

    It’s up to you!

    Every choice could be a stroke of genius... or the start of a nightmare!

    But beware, exceeding the time limit will trigger a time explosion💥!

    Time explosions aren’t always bad, though—if you get the right cards, you can exploit or avoid them!👌

    =============================================================================

  • 🌱 Infinite Strategy with Deck Combos 🌱


    (In the current DEMO version) we’ve designed:

    280+ unique cards: spells, plants, animals, buildings, and derivatives;

    140+ powerful pendants: combo with various decks or enhance your gameplay!

    With at least dozens of different playstyles to explore, each experience feels unique!

    (We’re still updating! Stay tuned for the full release!)

    =============================================================================

  • 🌍 Face Challenging Disaster Years 🌍


    (In the current DEMO [only the first stage])

    Time is the key as you progress through the game:

    14 decision-rich map events;

    16 tough but rewarding disaster years;

    3 types of cataclysms with special mechanics;

    (We’re still updating! Stay tuned for the full release!)

    =============================================================================

  • 🍀 Surprising and Diverse Rewards 🍀


    In the game, you’ll be able to:

    Open card packs!

    Open supply chests!

    Open Frog Scratchers!

    Earn gold, cards, pendants, and more—various ways to get rewards will provide rich experiences and progression in the game!
detailed_description:
Recent Game Status

"Rana Card" is now live on Steam! Feel free to add it to your wishlist 💖

We are currently preparing for a small-scale test, and we’ll share the test details with you as soon as possible 🌞


About the Game

  • 🐸 "Rana Card" is a roguelite card game 🐸

    You’ll play as a farm manager, completing KPI set by the Frog Corporation.

    Draw cards in exciting, tense moments!

    Navigate or exploit time explosions💥!

name: Rana Card

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: "Rana Card" is a roguelite card game where you manage a farm, complete KPI for the Frog.Draw cards in exciting, tense moments, you’ll navigate or exploit time explosion, earn packs and chests, build your deck, and play cards to earn gold.Face strategic choices, disasters, cataclysm along the way.
